si.title: පාසල්වල අධ්යාපන කටයුතු හෙට ආරම්භ වේ
body_lines: මේ අතර, මේ වසරේ පාසලේ පළමු වාරිකයේ දෙවන අදියර හෙට ආරම්භ වන අතර ඔහු ලබන මස 3 වනදා දක්වා පැවැත්වේ.
පළමු වාරිකයේ තුන්වන අදියර ලබන මස 20 සිට 31 දක්වා පැවැත්වේ.
අ.පො.ස. සාමාන්ය මට්ටමේ විභාගය මැයි 6 සිට 15 දක්වා පැවැත්වෙන බව විභාග දෙපාර්තමේන්තුව පවසයි.

en.title: Educational activities in schools are beginning tomorrow
body_lines: Meanwhile, the second phase of the school's first installment of this year will begin tomorrow and will be held until the 3rd of next month.
The third stage of the first installment will be held from 20th to 31st of next month.
The Department of Examinations said that the GCE Ordinary Level Examination will be held from 6 to 15th May.

summary_lines: Schools start educational activities tomorrow. The second phase of the school's first installment runs until 3rd May, followed by the third stage from 20th to 31st May. GCE Ordinary Level Examination is from 6th to 15th May.
